analyzed: de bas na 'dir yang ri rab dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs 'di'i rjes la gzugs ni mu ma mchis pa dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'don pa gang du mthong ba de nyid rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here also, after like Sumeru, the text should read, because form is limitless, etc., as it is seen in the other versions.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni sngar gtso cher bstan pa de bzhin du gzugs ni gzugs dang mtshungs zhes bya ba brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni sngar gtso cher bstan pa de bzhin du gzugs ni gzugs dang mtshungs zhes bya ba brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The text should read, form is like form, etc., just as it previously stated, form is primary, etc.

original: der de nyid dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: der de nyid dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to say, It is like itself.

original: de bas na 'di 'don par mi rigs pas te ci ltar po ti sngar gyi mang po rnams las mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di 'don par mi rigs pas te ci ltar po ti sngar gyi mang po rnams las mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, this reading is not correct. It should read, because form is limitless, etc., as it is seen in the other versions.

original: gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Form is the separation of the accumulation of virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: bsags pa dang bral ba ni rnam par bral ba'i stong pa nyid de la ni gzugs kho na de de'i ngo bo nyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsags pa dang bral ba ni rnam par bral ba'i stong pa nyid de la ni gzugs kho na de de'i ngo bo nyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Separation of the accumulation is emptiness of separation. Form is just that, because it is the nature of that.

original: des na gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi brtsams pa dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba nyid kyi don to //
analyzed: des na gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi brtsams pa dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba nyid kyi don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúForm is the same as the accumulation of virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena‚Äù is just that.

original: gzugs ni bral ba ste zhes bya ba nas ci srid sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so //
analyzed: gzugs ni bral ba ste zhes bya ba nas ci srid sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so //
translated: Form is separation, up to the statement ‚ÄúThe buddhadharmas are separation.‚Äù

original: gang zhig de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad de rnams nyid gzugs te tha mi dad par nye bar btags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad de rnams nyid gzugs te tha mi dad par nye bar btags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The buddhadharmas are all those. They are just form, because they are designated as nondifferent. The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe buddhadharmas are the same as form‚Äù is just that.

original: gzugs kyang ci zhig bral ba ni stong pa nyid de de nyid ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyang ci zhig bral ba ni stong pa nyid de de nyid ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: What is form? Separation is emptiness. That is just the nature of form.

original: de nyid ni gzugs kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzugs kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: That is the reality of form.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni skabs 'di la gzugs kyi sgras gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni skabs 'di la gzugs kyi sgras gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The emptiness of form is what is called form in this context.

original: gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Form is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid mu ma mchis pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mu ma mchis pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The nature of emptiness is the nature of the reality of the limitless Dharma.

original: gzugs ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sems kyi spyod pa gang zhig 'dzin pa'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sems kyi spyod pa gang zhig 'dzin pa'i bya ba'o //
translated: Form arises from the activity of mind. The activity of mind is the action of grasping.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni tha mi dad par btags pa de dang mtshungs @283a * //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni tha mi dad par btags pa de dang mtshungs @283a * //
translated: Its arising is the designation of non-difference. It is similar to that.

original: pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: mi dmigs pa'i bar du zhes bya ba ni sngar ci skad gsungs pa'i gzugs ni bral ba ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i bar du zhes bya ba ni sngar ci skad gsungs pa'i gzugs ni bral ba ste /
translated: Up to non-apprehension. Form is separation, as previously stated.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ces bya ba gang zhig gsungs pa de la ltos pa'i bar gyi sgra'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ces bya ba gang zhig gsungs pa de la ltos pa'i bar gyi sgra'o //
translated: The words up to refer to the reality of form and the suchness of form that were mentioned.

original: gzugs ni bral ba dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang gzugs kyi mi dmigs pa nyid dang dge ba dang mi dge ba tha mi dad par brtags pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs ni bral ba dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang gzugs kyi mi dmigs pa nyid dang dge ba dang mi dge ba tha mi dad par brtags pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Form is the separation, the intrinsic reality of form, the suchness of form, the non-apprehension of form, and the non-differentiation of virtue and non-virtue.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ste /
translated: Thus, Subh≈´ti, it is said.üîΩThus is the meaning of thus.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni ci ltar 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sngar bstan pa rnam pa gnyis kyang mdor bsdus nas le'u 'di la de ltar nye bar
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni ci ltar 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sngar bstan pa rnam pa gnyis kyang mdor bsdus nas le'u 'di la de ltar nye bar
translated: Just as this perfection of wisdom, with the two aspects of the nature of the knowledge of paths and the knowledge of all aspects, was previously taught, it is also taught in this chapter in brief.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus is the meaning of thus.

original: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su tshol bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su tshol bar bya ba'o //
translated: It is to be sought after.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na gsungs pa ni /
translated: Then what is to be done? It is said:

original: rjes su rig par byed pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su rig par byed pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should understand.

original: yi ge'i tshogs kyis thos par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i tshogs kyis thos par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By the collection of letters, one will hear.

original: rnam par spyod pa dang zhes bya ba ni don gyi lus kyis shes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa dang zhes bya ba ni don gyi lus kyis shes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the investigation‚Äù means that one understands the body of the meaning.

original: 'jug pa ni dad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni dad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the entry‚Äù means that one has faith.

original: rtogs par byed pa ni dran pa nye bar gnas pa nyid kyis gzhung dang don de dag dus thams cad du 'di'i blo la gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa ni dran pa nye bar gnas pa nyid kyis gzhung dang don de dag dus thams cad du 'di'i blo la gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the realization‚Äù means that one‚Äôs mind always remains in the text and the meaning, due to the establishment of mindfulness.

original: sems pa ni gsungs pa'i don rnams la grangs kyi go rims kyis dus ci lta bar nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems pa ni gsungs pa'i don rnams la grangs kyi go rims kyis dus ci lta bar nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the thought‚Äù means that one‚Äôs mind remains in the meaning of the teaching, in accordance with the order of enumeration.

original: 'jal ba ni don de la rigs pas dpyod par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jal ba ni don de la rigs pas dpyod par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the evaluation‚Äù means that one examines the meaning with reasoning.

original: nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'di tsam nyid kyis the tshom thams cad gcod pas 'di ni de bzhin de zhes bya ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'di tsam nyid kyis the tshom thams cad gcod pas 'di ni de bzhin de zhes bya ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the investigation‚Äù means that one holds to the statement ‚ÄúThis is just so‚Äù because all doubts are eliminated by this alone.

original: bsgom par 'gyur ba ni phyi nas so //üîΩsgom pa la bar chad byed pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa ni /
analyzed: bsgom par 'gyur ba ni phyi nas so // sgom pa la bar chad byed pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOne engages in the cultivation‚Äù means that one cultivates later.

original: rgyu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The avoidance of the faults that are obstacles to cultivation is stated in the line ‚Äúthe cause, etc.‚Äù

original: de la sgyu ni sgom pa po ma yin pa nyid yod bzhin du rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i don du pha rol po rnams la de ltar nye bar bstan pa'o //üîΩg-yo ni nus pa yod kyang rjes su mi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgyu ni sgom pa po ma yin pa nyid yod bzhin du rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i don du pha rol po rnams la de ltar nye bar bstan pa'o // g-yo ni nus pa yod kyang rjes su mi sgrub pa'o //
translated: Pretense is the display of what is not the case to others for the sake of gain and honor, while dissimulation is the concealment of one's faults.

original: le lo ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po la mngon par chags pa'o //üîΩrlom @283b sems thams cad ni bdag ces bya ba dang pa dag gi zhes bya ba dang gzugs zhes bya ba dang tshor ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: le lo ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po la mngon par chags pa'o // rlom @283b sems thams cad ni bdag ces bya ba dang pa dag gi zhes bya ba dang gzugs zhes bya ba dang tshor ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Sloth is the attachment to things that are accompanied by evil.üîΩAll conceits are the attachments to I, mine, form, and feeling.

original: rlom zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tsa'i mtha' can las yu tsa'o //
analyzed: rlom zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tsa'i mtha' can las yu tsa'o //
translated: The word conceit is from the root yuj with the suffix u, and the suffix u is added to the root yuj in the sense of conceit.

original: des na rlom sems so //
analyzed: des na rlom sems so //
translated: Therefore, it is conceit.

original: bdag la bstod pa ni bdag ni g-yeng ba med pa dang rab tu byung ba dang gzugs bzang ba dang blta na sdug pa dang mang du thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la bstod pa ni bdag ni g-yeng ba med pa dang rab tu byung ba dang gzugs bzang ba dang blta na sdug pa dang mang du thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Self-praise is the claim that I am without distraction, I am a monk, I am handsome, I am good-looking, I am learned, and so on.

original: gzhan la smod pa ni gzhan rnams rigs dman pa las skyes pa ci srid du thos pa mang ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la smod pa ni gzhan rnams rigs dman pa las skyes pa ci srid du thos pa mang ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Disparaging others is such as, How can those born of low families have much learning?

original: slar bdag la sogs pa'i 'du shes kyis 'di'i ci lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab skye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir de spong pa'o //
analyzed: slar bdag la sogs pa'i 'du shes kyis 'di'i ci lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab skye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir de spong pa'o //
translated: One does not generate the wisdom of this sort by the notion of I and so on, so one abandons that.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rtog pa gang zhig ni rtog pa thams cad do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rtog pa gang zhig ni rtog pa thams cad do //
translated: Conceptualization by the afflictions is any conceptualization.

original: de'i tshe 'di rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: At that time, it will be difficult to find this, and so on.

original: yon tan thams cad ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams so //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams so //
translated: All virtues are the virtues of the bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni mjug go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni mjug go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The perfection of the buddha-field and virtues is the conclusion.

original: 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'di stong pa nyid bstan pa'i gtso bo ste /
analyzed: 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'di stong pa nyid bstan pa'i gtso bo ste /
translated: Now, this Perfection of Wisdom Sutra is the foremost teacher of emptiness, and it is said that the perfection of wisdom is the mother, and skill in means is the father.

original: gang gi phyir yang dang yang du rnam pa mang pos 'dir stong pa nyid kho na mdo rdzogs pa'i bar du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yang dang yang du rnam pa mang pos 'dir stong pa nyid kho na mdo rdzogs pa'i bar du bstan pa yin no //
translated: For this reason, emptiness alone is taught here in many ways, in the sutra, up to the end.

original: gal te 'di zhar la 'byung bar 'gyur na lan cig dgag pa tsam byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di zhar la 'byung bar 'gyur na lan cig dgag pa tsam byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If this were a mere incidental matter, it would be refuted only once.

original: chen mo rnams las ni stong pa nyid rnam pa bcu drug bstan te nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chen mo rnams las ni stong pa nyid rnam pa bcu drug bstan te nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the great scriptures, sixteen kinds of emptiness are taught, beginning with the emptiness of the internal and the emptiness of the external.

original: de rnams 'dir ci'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams 'dir ci'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are they not taught here?

original: bstan pa kho na ste 'on kyang ming gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: bstan pa kho na ste 'on kyang ming gzhan gyis so //
translated: They are taught, but by other names.

original: ming gzhan zhes bya ba 'di yang gang yin zhe na /üîΩdon gzhan gyi ngag don gtso bo nyid kyis skabs su bab pa'i ming ni bstan pa ste brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ming gzhan zhes bya ba 'di yang gang yin zhe na / don gzhan gyi ngag don gtso bo nyid kyis skabs su bab pa'i ming ni bstan pa ste brjod pa'o //
translated: What are these other names?üîΩThe meaning of the occasion, which is the principal meaning of the other words, is taught, is expressed, by the name that is appropriate.

original: de brjod pa gtso bo'i ngag gi yan lag nyid kyis bstan pa'i nyi tshe ba'i ngag don nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de brjod pa gtso bo'i ngag gi yan lag nyid kyis bstan pa'i nyi tshe ba'i ngag don nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The expression of that is the principal meaning of the words that are the branches of teaching. The meaning of the limited expression is the meaning of the words.

original: ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs te /
translated: How is it that the Lord has said this?

original: rab 'byor khyod spobs par byos shig ces bya ba nas ci srid du bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma 'tshal ma dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gang la @284a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod spobs par byos shig ces bya ba nas ci srid du bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma 'tshal ma dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gang la @284a * //
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, you should be eloquent‚Äù up to ‚ÄúBlessed One, if I do not know or see a bodhisattva, which bodhisattva should I advise and instruct in what?‚Äù up to ‚ÄúThis is the instruction and teaching.‚Äù

original: gdams par bgyi zhes bya ba nas 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba'i ngag gis nges par 'byung ba'i gdams ngag btso bo nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: gdams par bgyi zhes bya ba nas 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba'i ngag gis nges par 'byung ba'i gdams ngag btso bo nyid du gsungs so //
translated: By this statement, the instruction for definite emergence is taught to be excellent.
